formattedAddress: 36 Central Park S, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
The views are stunning! The service is great, the lady was there when we needed her, would occasionally check in on us, but was not too much. She even gave us the last drink on the house. I can‚Äôt speak for the quality of cocktails as we were drinking champagne, but we had a lovely evening!
Best time to go is definitely before it gets dark so you can see the view!

originalText.text:
My review of your lovely Darling Rooftop Bar is very complimentary! My best friend and I went there on September 15, to celebrate friendship ‚Äì and life. We could not have made a better decision than spending a few hours, at sunset, in the good hands of your exceptional staff. It was the most perfect clear, crisp day for a rooftop experience ‚Äì so this was incredible in every way. This was like a secret intimate hideaway and made everyone feel like the real world ‚Äì was a million miles away.

We could see for miles and there was a cool breeze to compliment things.  The view ‚Äì unforgettable, the food and drinks ‚Äì really enjoyable. But ‚Äì it was your wonderful, friendly and dedicated staff that really made everything so perfect and gave us an evening we‚Äôll long remember.  I must mention the people who went above and beyond to ensure we were welcomed and well taken care of: Anthony, Juan Carlos and Michael.  Please pass along our sincere thanks to them all for a job well done.  See you next time we feel like being pampered.

originalText.text: Made reservations for 6pm Sat evening and showed up a bit earlier to catch sunset. There was a huge wedding party which was not mentioned when I phoned to enquire if can move reservation up. In fact was actually told that it‚Äôs quieter around 6pm. Got sat by the bar with 0 view and mentioned that we were welcomed to take photos. Cocktails we ordered tasted horrible for $23 in which I had to send back and just get a glass of Prosecco. One of the drinks came half filled which was additionally annoying. Needless to say will not come back but ofc if you‚Äôre looking for a view - suggest to ensure your seats have one.

originalText.text: Overall very nice experience. Went on. Friday, definitely do reservations on weekends. Drinks, view, service and food were all good and we will repeat in future. It‚Äôs on the $ side but so is everything these days.
